content.html: One of the (many) things I'm really proud of at @incident_io is how the team are honest when projects are off track and immediately swarm to regroup, course correct and keep momentum high. Comms clear throughout. I also *love* @linear's project tracking feature ❤️
content.value:
One of the (many) things I'm really proud of at @incident_io is how the team are honest when projects are off track and immediately swarm to regroup, course correct and keep momentum high. Comms clear throughout.

I also *love* @linear's project tracking feature ❤️
